name: Zoho CRM Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 Zoho CRM Tool 节点。主要用于: Consume Zoho CRM API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Consume Zoho CRM API | (必填项)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: account

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: create
available_options: Create or Update (值: upsert) - Create a new record, or update the current one if it already exists (upsert)
Get Many (值: getAll) - Get many vendors

accountName.name: accountName
accountName.description: Name of the account. If a record with this account name exists it will be updated, otherwise a new one will be created.
accountName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Account Name | 作用: Name of the account. If a record with this account name exists it will be updated, otherwise a new one will be created. | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: customFields (值: None) - Filter by custom fields

accountId.name: accountId
accountId.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
accountId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Account Name or ID | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression | 默认值: [] | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 5

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: approved (值: None) - Whether to retrieve only approved records. Defaults to true.
converted (值: None) - Whether to retrieve only converted records. Defaults to false.
fields (值: None) - Return only these fields
include_child (值: None) - Whether to retrieve only records from child territories
sort_by (值: None) - Field to sort records by
sort_order (值: None) - Ascending or descending order sort order
territory_id (值: None) - Retrieve only records from this territory

updateFields.name: updateFields
updateFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: customFields (值: None) - Filter by custom fields

lastName.name: lastName
lastName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Last Name | (必填项)

contactId.name: contactId
contactId.description: ID of the contact to update
contactId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Contact ID | 作用: ID of the contact to update | (必填项)

dealName.name: dealName
dealName.description: Name of the deal. If a record with this deal name exists it will be updated, otherwise a new one will be created.
dealName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Deal Name | 作用: Name of the deal. If a record with this deal name exists it will be updated, otherwise a new one will be created. | (必填项)

stage.name: stage
stage.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
stage.natural_language_description: 参数名: Stage Name or ID | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression | 默认值: [] | (必填项)

dealId.name: dealId
dealId.description: ID of the deal to update
dealId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Deal ID | 作用: ID of the deal to update | (必填项)

subject.name: subject
subject.description: Subject or title of the sales order. If a record with this subject exists it will be updated, otherwise a new one will be created.
subject.natural_language_description: 参数名: Subject | 作用: Subject or title of the sales order. If a record with this subject exists it will be updated, otherwise a new one will be created. | (必填项)

Product_Details.name: Product_Details
Product_Details.natural_language_description: 参数名: Products | 默认值: {}
available_options: id (值: None) - Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

invoiceId.name: invoiceId
invoiceId.description: ID of the invoice to update
invoiceId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Invoice ID | 作用: ID of the invoice to update | (必填项)

Company.name: Company
Company.description: Company at which the lead works
Company.natural_language_description: 参数名: Company | 作用: Company at which the lead works | (必填项)

leadId.name: leadId
leadId.description: ID of the lead to update
leadId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Lead ID | 作用: ID of the lead to update | (必填项)

productName.name: productName
productName.description: Name of the product. If a record with this product name exists it will be updated, otherwise a new one will be created.
productName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Product Name | 作用: Name of the product. If a record with this product name exists it will be updated, otherwise a new one will be created. | (必填项)

productId.name: productId
productId.description: ID of the product to update
productId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Product ID | 作用: ID of the product to update | (必填项)

vendorId.name: vendorId
vendorId.description: ID of the vendor to update
vendorId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Vendor ID | 作用: ID of the vendor to update | (必填项)

purchaseOrderId.name: purchaseOrderId
purchaseOrderId.description: ID of the purchase order to update
purchaseOrderId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Purchase Order ID | 作用: ID of the purchase order to update | (必填项)

quoteId.name: quoteId
quoteId.description: ID of the quote to update
quoteId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Quote ID | 作用: ID of the quote to update | (必填项)

salesOrderId.name: salesOrderId
salesOrderId.description: ID of the sales order to update
salesOrderId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Sales Order ID | 作用: ID of the sales order to update | (必填项)

vendorName.name: vendorName
vendorName.description: Name of the vendor. If a record with this vendor name exists it will be updated, otherwise a new one will be created.
vendorName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Vendor Name | 作用: Name of the vendor. If a record with this vendor name exists it will be updated, otherwise a new one will be created. | (必填项)
